channel.title: Network on The D Word
channel.description: Recent content in Network on The D Word

item.title: Chess Matters - Exploring a chess database
item.description: Introduction In this post I am going to explore some chess data. The data is obtained from a free online chess database. In addition, I have scraped chess openings from FICGS and matched them to the first moves from each game from the chess DB. Originally the chess DB contained about 3.5 million games, which took up about 2.5 GB. After I removed missing values, incomplete columns etc., I now have about 860000 games, which is much more manageable.
